body_html:
@techchic quick tip: if you stay on the branch you created to make the first pull request (pending-tag in your fork), you should be able to make the changes there and push — that way, you won't have to create a new PR, the changes will be added automatically to your current PR ( #668 )
Let me know if you need any help with that :)

body:
@techchic quick tip: if you stay on the branch you created to make the first pull request (`pending-tag` in your fork), you should be able to make the changes there and push — that way, you won't have to create a new PR, the changes will be added automatically to your current PR ( #668 )
Let me know if you need any help with that :)
